name: World of Warships: Legends – Living History
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – Living History
description:
Texas is the last surviving World War I-era dreadnought, and she appears in World of Warships: Legends as a Tier IV battleship! Get this naval legend along with a bunch of loot in the Living History bundle.

This bundle contains: - U.S. Tier IV battleship Texas - 7 days of Premium Account - 10x Promotion Orders - 30x Rare Boosters of each type

If you already have Texas in your Port, you'll receive the following compensation: Texas: 1,250 doubloons
